solution_line_template: Each employee needs ${target_salary}-${current_salary}=$<<{target_salary}-{current_salary}={extra_per_employee}>>{extra_per_employee} more per year.
In total, Emily needs to pay ${extra_per_employee}*{num_employees}=$<<{extra_per_employee}*{num_employees}={total_extra}>>{total_extra} extra.
Emily will need to have a new salary of ${emily_original_salary}-${total_extra}=$<<{emily_original_salary}-{total_extra}={emily_new_salary}>>{emily_new_salary} per year.
